channel.title: Why do you port forward?
channel.description: my router is a modem/router, do i still have to portforward, i thought portforward was only if you use wireless, im connected .

item.title: Why do you port forward?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

No. You are retarded. You still have to port forward.

Port forwarding allows people connect to you via WAN, i.e. the internet. You are connected to your router via LAN, which doesnâ€™t require port forwarding, as it is completely redundant.

So, yes. If you want to host a server for other people outside of your house to play on, you have to port forward.

Read full topic
